pie_de_pagina.unirse: Join our group of strategic partners

inicio.titulo: Leading distributor of the best brands in technology and appliances
inicio.subtitulo: Specialists in offline and online channels, we provide exceptional experiences in prices and products.
inicio.descripcion: Space Brands is a leader in the distribution of technology and appliances in LATAM, with over 20 years of experience in retail. We connect leading brands with retailers and marketplaces, managing a portfolio of over 500 products.

elementos.descripcion: We integrate online and offline channels to maximize the impact of our brands, consolidating a network with over 30 alliances in retailers and marketplaces.
We collaborate with leaders in technology, managing over 500 SKUs. We project 2,500 monthly transactions for 2025, optimizing deliveries and customer experience.
We are ready to grow in the region where we have a network of contacts. Our product adaptation model will position us as leaders in custom OEM products.
We apply strategic investments that ensure competitive prices and an annual growth of 15% TEA for our partners and investors.

servicios.descripcion: We develop high-performance technological products, designed and adapted to the local market from concept to implementation.

elementos.descripcion: More than 50 specialists in sales and indirect/direct dropshipping that boost the visibility of our brands, maximizing SKU turnover.
We manage over 300 points of sale with advanced tools that optimize product availability at the right time and place.
We provide efficient support nationwide through our authorized network, with a 97% customer satisfaction rate and quick response times.

socios.descripcion: We collaborate with over 30 retailers and/or marketplaces, ensuring comprehensive distribution and a strong presence in major sales channels.
socios.descripcion-footer: Our distribution capacity guarantees the presence of our products on the most important online platforms in the region.

cobertura.descripcion: We guarantee efficient and timely distribution in over 400 physical points of sale throughout Peru, ensuring comprehensive service that optimizes time and costs. Our logistics strategy covers 100% of the national territory.

cards.title: 2024.Q4
cards.content: Implementation of a new application to optimize catalog management in marketplaces like Ripley, Falabella, and Mercado Libre, using the Precios Calientes platform.

cards.title: 2025.Q1
cards.content: Incorporation of new regional distributors in the northern and central regions of the country.

cards.title: 2025.Q2
cards.content: Expansion of the Precios Calientes platform to Bolivia.

cards.title: 2025.Q3
cards.content: Implementation of an advanced data-driven logistics solution to improve delivery times and reduce costs by 20%.
cards.footer: Real-time logistics in Peru and Bolivia

cards.title: 2025.Q4
cards.content: Creation of custom products under the Space Brands label in partnership with OEM manufacturers.

cards.title: 2026.Q1
cards.content: Expansion of product presence in department stores and supermarkets in Peru and Bolivia.

cards.title: 2026.Q3
cards.header: Full Integration of Online and Offline Operations
cards.content: Unification of the management platform to control real-time sales both online and in physical stores.

cards.title: 2027.Q1
cards.content: Launch of an e-commerce platform by brand ecosystem for direct sale of products represented by Space Brands.

cards.title: 2027.Q3
cards.header: Expansion to New Latin American Markets
cards.content: Entry into Colombia and Chile with a comprehensive distribution offering.

tecnologia.descripcion: Our focus on technology and innovation allows us to manage over 60,000 annual transactions in the short term. By 2026, we plan to double our installed capacity. With advanced data analysis tools, we optimize inventories, logistics, and sales, improving customer experience and maximizing operational efficiency.

elementos.descripcion: We make data-driven decisions that improve inventory turnover and optimize product management.
We automate shipping, price management, and catalogs in major marketplaces, reducing human errors by 90%.
